Package org.opends.server.core

Class DeleteOperationBasis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.types.AbstractOperation
      • org.opends.server.core.DeleteOperationBasis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, DeleteOperation, Operation, PluginOperation, PostResponseDeleteOperation, PostResponseOperation, PreParseDeleteOperation, PreParseOperation
    public class DeleteOperationBasis
extends AbstractOperation
implements PreParseDeleteOperation, DeleteOperation, PostResponseDeleteOperation
    This class defines an operation that may be used to remove an entry from the Directory Server.

      • DeleteOperationBasis

        public DeleteOperationBasis​(ClientConnection clientConnection,
                            long operationID,
                            int messageID,
                            List<Control> requestControls,
                            ByteString rawEntryDN)
        Creates a new delete operation with the provided information.
        Parameters:
        clientConnection - The client connection with which this operation is associated.
        operationID - The operation ID for this operation.
        messageID - The message ID of the request with which this operation is associated.
        requestControls - The set of controls included in the request.
        rawEntryDN - The raw, unprocessed DN of the entry to delete, as included in the client request.

      • DeleteOperationBasis

        public DeleteOperationBasis​(ClientConnection clientConnection,
                            long operationID,
                            int messageID,
                            List<Control> requestControls,
                            DN entryDN)
        Creates a new delete operation with the provided information.
        Parameters:
        clientConnection - The client connection with which this operation is associated.
        operationID - The operation ID for this operation.
        messageID - The message ID of the request with which this operation is associated.
        requestControls - The set of controls included in the request.
        entryDN - The entry DN for this delete operation.

      • getEntryDN

        public final DN getEntryDN()
        Description copied from interface: DeleteOperation
        Retrieves the DN of the entry to delete. This should not be called by pre-parse plugins because the processed DN will not be available yet. Instead, they should call the getRawEntryDN method.
        Specified by:
        getEntryDN in interface DeleteOperation
        Specified by:
        getEntryDN in interface PostResponseDeleteOperation
        Returns:
        The DN of the entry to delete, or null if the raw entry DN has not yet been processed.
